name: ANNEXXI
description:
A RPG strategy prototype made in a week, and is another week away from being an actual game.

The prototype generates a large terrain made out of hexagons, which are set to have different biomes. I've implemented basic selection, movement and combat features.

Caution! The program does not have a save function, anything you do in it will be lost! (You can't do much in it yet anyway)

Controls

  • Hold M to view the map
  • Hold middle mouse button and move the cursor to pan
    • You can also use W A S D, though this doesn't work well yet
  • Scroll wheel to zoom in and out
  • Left mouse button to select the unit
  • Press space bar with the unit selected to settle a city once
  • Press the right mouse button on a tile around the unit to move it there
  • Press enter and click Yes to end your turn
  • Quit the program and restart it to generate a new world
